summary: Full backend and frontend testing of IT Service Desk Voice Agent. All 9 backend API tests passed. UI renders correctly with dark sci-fi theme.
seed_data_creation: 8 KB articles and 3 tickets seeded on startup
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core APIs working: /api/health, /api/tickets (CRUD), /api/kb (CRUD + search). UI: 3-panel layout with dark sci-fi theme, voice orb shows OFFLINE, tickets panel shows TKT-001/002/003 with filter buttons (ALL/OPEN/IN PROGRESS/RESOLVED/CLOSED), KB tab shows 8 articles with working search filter. Voice WebSocket /api/ws not tested (requires microphone).
